sn34.35-40:1.3: samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo …
sn34.35-40:1.4: neva samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo …
sn34.35-40:1.5: samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo ca.
sn34.35-40:1.9: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva cattālīsamā kallitamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā cha suttāni pūretabbāni. Kallitamūlakaṃ.)
